dct_title_s: Colton's map of the United States of America, the British provinces, Mexico, the West Indies and Central America with part of New Granada and Venezuela
dct_alternative_sm: Colton's map of the United States Mexico &c

Map of the United States of America, The British Provinces, Mexico, the West Indies and Central America with part of New Granada and Venezuela New York. Published by J.H. Colton, No. 86 Cedar St. 1850 [linear scales; about 100 miles = one inch] Explanations --- Drawn By Geo. W. Colton. Engraved by John. M. Atwood. Border Desigd. & Engd. by W.S. Barnard } New York [inset : ] A Map of the Atlantic Ocean showing the American & European Ports and the Routes of the Atlantic Steamers [inset:] The Isthmus of Panama Showing the Routes of Travel Between Chagres & Panama Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1848 by J.H. Colton in the Clerks Office of the Southern District of New York
dct_description_sm: drawn By Geo. W. Colton ; engraved by John. M. Atwood ; border desigd. & engd. by W. S. Barnard.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "statute miles" and "geographical miles."
Includes legend and table of distances.
Shows topography, drainage, state boundaries, cities and towns, railroads, roads, canals, ocean routes, etc.
Floral border and decorative cartouche with eagle.
"Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1848 by J.H. Colton in the Clerks Office of the Southern District of New York."
Collector's note: Additional and changed place names in California. "Gold Region" still appears north of the American River; "El Dorado Gold Region" appears along the Feather River.

2 inset maps: A map of the Atlantic Ocean showing the American & European ports and routes of the ocean steamers (scale [approximately 1:31,000,000] -- The Isthmus of Panama showing the routes of travel between Chagres & Panama (scale [approximately 1:1,000,000].

12 pictorial vignettes: Willammette Falls, Oregon -- Astoria, Oregon -- Saratoga Lake, New York -- Valley of the Connecticut from Mt. Holyoke -- Bunker Hill Monument Boston, Mass. -- Washington Monument New York -- Capitol, Washington City -- Entrance of a port -- Mexicans catching wild cattle -- -- Cathedral, City of Mexico -- Pulaski Monument Savannah, Ga. -- Pulaski Monument Savannah, Ga. --- Battle Monument Baltimore, Md.
dct_publisher_sm: J. H. Colton, No. 86 Cedar Street,
